name: DVD Drive Flashing And Modding
description:
- All fat model DVD drives can be flashed, some replacement drives are available. Enquire for price

- Please do not contact me about copied games

name: RROD Repair
description:
All RROD related issues can be repaired
included in the price of RROD repairs is
- x-clamp removal and inclusion of nylon washers and screws placed on the outside of the chassis for easy access
- professional grade silver thermal paste 
- reflow of GPU and CPU chip plus HANA chip if needed
* Microsoft charge $100 for this service and do not even replace the x-clamps, also offering a 3 month warranty, i like to believe i provide a more professional service than theres
** the only better service you will get is a professional reball not reflow which will cost $100+
- If your machine RROD again as most professionals say it will you can sell it on ebay broken and get some cash.

- Most jobs will be priced as listed, some may incur extra costs if there are further issues involved

- All jobs will incur a $20 fee for parts and outcome reguardless of the outcome, however i have not had an xbox i have not been able to fix with a RROD
